query: SELECT paciente_id, COUNT(*) as total, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT nome_exame_original) as exames FROM resultados_laboratoriais WHERE paciente_id IN (47, 50, 51) GROUP BY paciente_id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2eJNWYGY92vZU3w.root --database TyeFpW5ykZHTuZXuk6iMG7 --execute SELECT paciente_id, COUNT(*) as total, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT nome_exame_original) as exames FROM resultados_laboratoriais WHERE paciente_id IN (47, 50, 51) GROUP BY paciente_id;
